title: (x) De Argentina classic serif caps - Felix Titling {Lex}
content:
OK this is a tricky one I can't find it. It looks like Shango or Schneidler Initials but the R curls up. Any ideas? Winner can have my leftover pumpkin.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804073438/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_9.jpg) | 21.7 KB |
author: Pattie P

comments.content:
It's hard to tell with all those scaling artefacts, but I think it's [Felix Titling.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804073438/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/felix_titling/?sample_text=DE%20ARGENTINA&sample_size=36)

- Lex
